org.antfarmer.ejce.encoder

Class AbstractBase64Encoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.antfarmer.ejce.encoder.AbstractBase64Encoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextEncoder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractBase64UrlEncoder, Base64Encoder, Base64PaddedEncoder

    public abstract class AbstractBase64Encoder
extends Object
implements TextEncoder
    Abstract encoder for encoding/decoding bytes and text using the Base-64 format. The character set includes: [A-Za-z0-9+/]. This format results in a 33% increase in output length at best. This class is thread-safe.
